item.title: My Tidymodels Exercises
item.description: “The only way to learn mathematics is to do mathematics.” - Paul Halmos. Taking time out of the day-to-day rush to finally learn how to use {tidymodels} for machine learning. These are the notebooks that I did to enter in this universe.
